mapper.select: SELECT parkingLimit FROM T_MYONE WHERE ACCOUNTNO=#{accountNo}
SELECT BALANCE FROM T_MYONE_POCKET WHERE POCKETCODE=4 AND ACCOUNTNO=#{accountNo}

SELECT A.ACCOUNTNO AS ACCOUNTNO, A.AUTODIVAMOUNT AS AUTODIVAMOUNT, B.FROMPOCKET AS FROMPOCKET, B.PARKINGAMOUNT AS PARKINGAMOUNT FROM T_AUTO_DIVIDE A, T_AUTO_PARKING B WHERE A.TOPOCKET = B.FROMPOCKET AND A.ACCOUNTNO='${ACCOUNTNO}'
